title: How to use Chatgpt for data science
description: ChatGPT can assist data scientists in data cleaning and preprocessing, model training, and result interpretation, as well as insights into decision-making processes.

title: How to integrate chatGPT in R
description: ChatGPT provides a set of features to assist in R coding. This blog describes how to work R with ChatGPT.
contents: There are lots of websites to help people with some R experience to learn R or be more productive.Here is a concise guide to work R with chat-GPT.
